summary: The Nazgûl, also known as the Black Riders or Ringwraiths, are nine powerful servants of Sauron in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth. Once human, they became immortal but invisible spirits, bound to Sauron's power. They are led by the Witch-king of Angmar and are feared for their ability to spread terror. Initially riding black horses, they later mount flying creatures. Their main goal is to retrieve the One Ring. The Nazgûl are defeated in the Battle of the Pelennor Fields. They have appeared in various adaptations of Tolkien's work.
title: Nazgûl
